label: Total working days in a month.

label: Is the vyapaari a full time Istri Vyapaari at the shop?

label: Total Staff / Employees
hint: Input the number excluding the primary vyapaari.

name: working_hours_family_member
label: Total working hours of Family Member Employees?

name: Total_Hours_of_Working
label: Total Hours of Working
hint: Number of hours the vyapaari works in the shop

name: Higher_Earnings

name: Note_Collect_daily_tions_where_possible
label: Note: Collect daily over monthly data for next set of questions where possible.

label: Monthly Revenue.
hint: Answer the daily question if monthly data is not available.

name: vyapaari_daily_revenue
label: Daily Revenue.
hint: Answer the monthly question if daily data is not available.

name: vyapaari_coal_expenses
label: Monthly amount spend on coal fuel purchase.
hint: Answer the daily question if monthly data is not available.

name: vyapaari_coal_expenses_daily
label: Daily amount spend on coal fuel purchase.
hint: Answer the monthly question if daily data is not available.

name: vyapaari_coal_quantity
label: Monthly quantity of coal used  (in kilograms)

name: How_much_time_in_mi_eating_up_coal_daily
label: Time spend on heating up coal daily (in minutes)
hint: Total heating time over multiple sessions.

name: Delivery_Status

label: Will the vyapaari recommend the LPG press / iron box to others in Future?
